verses.verse: A Prayer of David. Bow down <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H6041><s%>; For I am poor and needy <S%H34><s%>.
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; For I am godly <S%H2623><s%>: O thou my God <S%H430><s%>, save <S%H3467><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> that trusteth in thee <S%H982><s%>.
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H136><s%>, O Lord; For unto thee do I cry <S%H7121><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>; For unto thee <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For thou <S%H136><s%>, Lord, art good <S%H2896><s%>, and ready to forgive <S%H5546><s%>, And abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> unto all them that call upon thee <S%H7121><s%>.
Give ear <S%H238><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>; And hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> upon thee <S%H6030><s%>; For thou wilt answer me.
There is none like unto thee among the gods <S%H430><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%>; Neither are there any works like unto thy works <S%H4639><s%>.

All nations <S%H1471><s%> whom thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H136><s%>, O Lord; And they shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
For thou art great <S%H1419><s%>, and doest <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%>: Thou art God alone <S%H430><s%>.

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy way <S%H1870><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in thy truth <S%H571><s%>: Unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H136><s%>, O Lord my God <S%H430><s%>, with my whole heart <S%H3824><s%>; And I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
For great <S%H1419><s%> is thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> toward me <S%H5337><s%>; And thou hast delivered my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> Sheol <S%H7585><s%>.

O God <S%H430><s%>, the proud <S%H2086><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> up against me <S%H5712><s%>, And a company of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>, And have not set thee before them <S%H7760><s%>.

But thou <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, art a God <S%H410><s%> merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, Slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H7227><s%>, and abundant in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>.

Oh turn <S%H6437><s%> unto me <S%H2603><s%>, and have mercy upon me <S%H5414><s%>; Give thy strength <S%H5797><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, And save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of thy handmaid <S%H519><s%>.

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a token <S%H226><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, That they who hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H954><s%>, and be put to shame, Because thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, hast helped <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H5162><s%>, and comforted me.
